title: Geodemancer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Throw a geode at a player, causing it to crack open

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The geode will deal a basic attack to the player
-When the geode cracks open, it will reveal a gem with the same color as your target’s faction’s color. You learn this color
-If your target is neutral, the geode will have no gem
-Your ability is astral, and trackers will see you visit the ground

desc:
Post 3438
_The word Geo makes me think of rocks_
